11111.content:
"Ugh, hurry up, Takamaki! We're burnin' daylight!"

"Don't rush me, Ryuji! Besides, I'm almost ready!" Ann Takamaki called out, her voice echoing in locker room she was just finishing getting ready in. When she asked Ryuji Sakamoto to help her exercise and keep fit for her blossoming modeling career, she knew the bleached blonde boy would be obnoxious about it, but they hadn't even started yet and he was already getting on her case.

As good of friends they were, Ryuji's hot-headed attitude always got on her nerves, and if he hadn't proven how knowledgeable he was at working out, she would have gone to the gym alone. But the last time she'd been to the gym with him and their mutual black-haired friend, he was able to give her plenty of direction and make sure she got a full workout, which she knew she needed. Unlike the last time she had been to the gym with Ryuji, Ann had ditched her school P.E. sweats, instead wearing tight dark red jogging pants and a crimson tank top, an outfit she'd gotten specifically to be reminiscent of her former Phantom Thieves gear. She'd never wear that dominatrix cat suit in the real world, but form-fitting red workout clothes were a good alternative.

Storing the rest of her belongings in a locker, Ann paused for a moment, then reached into her bag. Digging for a moment, she found the small diamond she was looking for. It was no bigger than her fingernail, and it wasn't a real diamond, not in the traditional sense- it was a gem created from a Shadow from the Metaverse. Joker had called it Regent, named after the real diamond, and through some method she didn't quite understand, Joker had turned the Shadow into a physical object. A melancholy looked passed over her face; Joker had left behind a lot of trinkets and gear from their time as the Phantom Thieves when he moved back to his hometown. One of them was the fake Regent diamond Ann now held softly, something she kept to remind her of her far away friend.

Blinking away the beginnings of tears, Ann smiled. It was sad to think about, but Joker wasn't gone forever or even that far away really, and he wouldn't want her to be so sappy anyway. Good times were hard to think about sometimes, she knew, and didn't let it get her down. Still smiling and without thinking about it, Ann pulled her shirt and sports bra open and dropped the diamond into her bust. Not the best place to keep a precious keepsake, but it was the only place she had on her to keep it relatively safe, held against her chest due to the snug bra.

"For motivation!" She said out loud in her usual bubbly tone. Knowing Ryuji was getting agonizingly impatient, Ann slammed the locker closed and dashed outside.

"Pff, took you long enough!" Ryuji said, scowling with his arms crossed and leaning against the wall next to the doorway Ann emerged from.

"Whatever. You look like such a creep waiting outside the girl's locker room, by the way!" She replied with playful snark.

"Shuddup! I'm doin' you a favor here, y'know!" He bit back. Pulling off the wall, the track athlete took the lead. "C'mon. Let's stretch out and then get some cardio. That'll be plenty for you right now." Ann dutifully followed, inwardly thankful for Ryuji. As much of a hard time as they gave each other, she knew he cared, and she suspected he felt the same way about her.

Nearing the treadmills, Ryuji stopped to stretch, bending his right leg behind him and pulling on his ankle. Ann followed his lead, unaware of the faint glow the diamond in her cleavage was emitting. During all of the Phantom Thieves heists, none of them had ever bothered to wear any of the gear into the real world, including items made from Treasure Demons. Joker never shared any of the equipment with the team as their leader, and none of them ever had a reason to ask for them. Now that Ann had "equipped" the Regent, however, she was unwittingly finding out that they actually had an effect on people in the real world, not just the Metaverse.

As she stretched, Ann was surprised with how easy it seemed to feel to her to do so. She wasn't exactly out of shape, but she was holding her leg taut for much longer than she expected to, not growing sore or tired at all. Shrugging, she began stretching the other leg, unaware of how taut her quads were on the leg she just lowered. The Regent under her top was an accessory that boosted the wearer's strength in the Metaverse, and it was beginning to do the same thing to Ann in the gym...
11111.title: Precious Gems Lead To Powerful Gains

111111.content:
As much as Ann had been surprised at her flexibility while stretching, she was even more taken aback at her endurance on the treadmill. It was effortless for her to keep pace with the setting Ryuji had set for her. Granted, it was a slow setting to match her beginner status, but she was more than taking it in stride for the past several minutes.

"Hey, can we turn this thing up? I'm not feeling much of a burn." Ann asked, not even slightly winded.

"Huh? Faster?" Ryuji said cautiously, not out of breath either; that was to be expected from a track runner, though. "I guess, just don't wear yourself out too fast. You won't get anywhere doing that."

"Yeah, yeah, I know my own limits." Ann replied dismissively, unaware of how false that statement was becoming.

With a couple of beeps Ann pressed the button to speed up her treadmill, keeping pace with it in flawless step. As she jogged more intensely, her slim legs began to strengthen, developing lean, dense calves and thighs. Her glutes were especially affected, firming up and rounding out just a bit, pulling her already tight pants even more taught against her defined butt.

"Okay, that's enough for now." Ryuji said after another 10 minutes of jogging, powering down his treadmill and hopping off. "Good job, you kept up pretty well."

"Thanks!" Ann replied with appreciative glee. "You should give me a challenge next time. I didn't even break a sweat!" Encouraged by Ryuji's rare praise, she proudly placed her hands on her hips, not noticing how much more solid they were than they had been less than an hour ago.

"Alright, don't act all cocky! You're still a newbie!" He scowled. Ann scowled back at him but let it drop, knowing that's just how he was. "Okay, you want to tone up, right? Let's get some weight lifting in." Ryuji moved away from the treadmills and towards the weight racks, so Ann followed, remembering her first workout with Ryuji. Before, she had barely been able to keep up with him and by the end of it she ended up huffing and puffing on the floor, too tired to even stand. But now she felt great, better even since her short run. Chalking it up to just underestimating herself, Ann put it out of her mind and focused on Ruyji.

"Let's see... Here, try these." He said after inspecting the dumbbells and pulling a couple smaller ones off the rack. "They're light but they should be fine for you."

"What? Only 10 pounds?" Ann asked as she took them in her hands. "But these are so light!"

"Duh. I just said that. Now, start with your arms at your side and slowly bend them up to your shoulders. Got it?"

"Ugh. Fine." She said, annoyed. Doing what Ryuji said, she lifted the dumbbells up and down several times. She tried to do as she was told and do slow reps, but the weights were so light it felt like she wasn't lifting anything at all. "Ryuji, this is way too easy! Aren't I supposed to feel some kind of burn?"

"That ain't the point!" He said. "You're supposed to do lots of small reps to build up your strength and then you-"

"Here." Ann interrupted, shoving the weights into Ryuji's arms.

"Hey! What the hell?!" He yelled, trying not the drop the light weights he'd been awkwardly given. Ignoring Ryuji, Ann reached for a new pair of dumbbells, making sure to grab larger ones than her friend had chosen for her. Deciding on the heftier weights with the number 25 on them, she picked them up with determination.

"Hup! Now that's more like it!" Ann said with a nervous smile. She was worried that she would embarrass herself by picking dumbbells that were too heavy for her, and that almost seemed true at first. After a moment, though, her grip seemed to tighten and secure the weights in her hands. Again following Ryuji's instructions, Ann slowly curled the dumbbells up and down and was pleased to feel actual tension in her arms.

"Don't just toss weights at a guy, Ann! That's dangerous!" Ryuji cried as he placed the small weights back on the rack. "And I can't afford to pay for them if you break 'em!" Looking back to Ann, he noticed the size of the weights she was lifting. "Wait, you're not having any trouble with those?"

"See? I told you those other ones were too light." She said, pumping her arms at a steady pace. With each lift her biceps tensed tighter, growing more solid with each rep. Her thin, delicate arms began to thicken ever so slightly, going from slim and undefined to tight and athletic in an incredibly short time. Unlike her cardio workout, she actually began to sweat a bit using the dumbbells, a sheen of perspiration appearing on her bare arms. After doing reps for a couple minutes, Ann finally slowed to a stop.

"Much better!" Ann said as she placed the weights back on the rack herself. "How'd I do?"

Ryuji stared at her for a moment before blinking. "Uhh... Really good, actually. You sure you haven't been trainin' on your own?"

"Yeah. Why, am I doing something wrong?" She asked innocently. Ryuji didn't know how to answer that- on the one hand, she was pushing way more than what her limits should have been for such a beginner, but on the other, she wasn't having any trouble with it. In fact, she was looking rather toned, at least in her slender arms- which were looking less slim and more built that Ryuji remembered.

"Nah, I'm just imagining things." He said. Ann was looking more athletic, sure, but she had been exercising for a while so she was probably just tensed up from that, and maybe he just hadn't been paying close attention to her lately. "I'm gonna need to work out a new routine, though... This stuff's too easy for you, I guess."

"Sure, sure, fine. Hey, what about that?" Ann dismissed Ryuji and pointed to...

1111111.content:
...the bench presses nearby, causing her small bicep to bob up.

"What, really?" Ryuji scoffed. "You wanna be a power lifter or something?"

"Come on, I'm still all hyped up. I've got energy to burn and I want to pump some iron!" She exclaimed, smiling brightly.

Ryuji rolled his eyes at her chipper attitude. "Careful, keep talking like that and you'll turn into a meathead."

"You know, you really know how to kill a mood, Ryuji." Ann said, dropping her smile for an angry frown. "Just help me with this thing, will you?" With that she strolled to the bench press and laid down, waiting for Ryuji to come and show her what to do.

"Quit bein' so pushy! I'm the expert here, remember?" He retorted. Nevertheless, he followed her to the bench she was waiting for him at, a stark change from Ann following him less than an hour ago. Taking his place behind her and the bench, Ryuji went on with his direction. "Alright, grab the bar with both hands and lift, and make sure they're spread far enough apart, otherwise you'll just drop it."

"What, seriously?! You didn't even put any weight on it!" Ann complained.

"Yeah, 'cause you're an amateur! Now stop questionin' me, you asked me to coach you!" He snapped, growing tired of her attitude. Still, by that point it seemed like maybe she could handle a bit of weight...

"No way! I'm obviously way better at this than you're giving me credit for, so give me a real challenge already!" She pouted, not budging until Ryuji gave in.

He exhaled an exasperated sigh and decided it wasn't worth the effort to fight her on it (plus she had a point, she was a lot more in shape than he thought). "Fine. But don't go cryin' if you can't handle it, got it?" With that he went to the weight plates, picking out a couple of small 2.5 weights to only add a few pounds to the bar. Despite Ann's protests, Ryuji knew she couldn't be strong enough to lift more, if even that much. Quickly he attached the plates and locked them into place, then resumed his position behind the bench. "There, happy now?"

"I guess... It still looks too light though..." Ann said disapprovingly.

"Trust me, it ain't! Now are you gonna lift or not?"

"Okay, jeez! I don't see why you have to stand there like a perv, though." She said bluntly as she grabbed the barbell.

"I-I'm not a perv!" Ryuji relied, clearly flustered. "I'm a spotter, this is where I'm supposed to stand!" This was supposed business to him, not a time to indulge his more deviant thoughts and it threw him off that Ann had brought that sort of thing up. She didn't respond to his insistence though, instead following Ryuji's instructions and slowly lifted the bar.

Going frustratingly slow for her, the blonde girl pumped the barbell up and down in regular intervals like an oil well, feeling more of a strain than she expected but certainly not as taxing as Ryuji said. With each lift she could feel the tightness in her arms increasing, appreciating the steadily mounting pressure. It was soothing, like a massage that was making her more tense instead of relaxing her but still giving her a sense of satisfaction.

From Ryuji's persepctive, things were a lot more stress inducing. Normally he wouldn't avoid ogling Ann's body if he got the chance, but right now they were both supposed to be in workout mode. It was something he liked to take seriously, and wanted Ann to as well, so he affixed his gaze straight ahead while still keeping his hands ready to catch the bar just in case. Still, the fact that she was lying on her back right in front of him, in skintight clothes, distracted... it was too much temptation all at once. So, cautiously, he glanced down, hoping to get just a peek to satisfy his carnal curiousity.

For one, Ann was cutely grimacing in determination, and luckily she didn't notice Ryuji looking down at her with how intensly she was lifting. The barbell was moving with no issue but there were still a few beads of sweat on her forehead from the several reps she'd been doing so far. The more important issue at hand though was her chest, which Ryuji did his best not to outright ogle. He'd seen her more exposed than this before of course- her Phantom Thief outfit had had a cleavage window after all- but somehow she looked, well, bigger. Her bright red tank top was strained across the front at the peak of her bosom, her breasts appearing wider and more broad overall. They weren't obscenely larger than they had been, but Ryuji would have put money down that her boobs were bigger.

That was, in fact, a half truth. Ann's mammaries had in fact blown up a bit, enough to squish themselves tighter into her sports bra, but beneath them her pectorals were enlarging as well, stretching and growing thicker and more powerful underneath her bust. The increase in the strength and size of her chest muscles had the side effect of making her breasts stick out even further than if they had grown on their own, giving her an overall meager but solid boost to her sex appeal.

Ryuji was oblivious to all of the details though, choosing to ignore what he saw and readjusted his eyes to look forward again. He rationalized it as her having some sort of growth spurt he hadn't noticed, or an illusion since she was lying down, or something like that. Besides, bringing it up would at best make things awkward and at worst make her angry, so for once he took the path of least resistance.

She continued to lift for a few more reps before deciding she was done, clacking the barbell back onto the rack. "There! Like I said, no sweat!" She said as she sat up before wiping her forehead with hand. "Oh... Okay, a little sweat. Still, I think that went pretty well, right?" She asked as she stood up, allowing Ryuji to see her back, broader than he remembered, and with some semblance of actual muscle definition, leading down to her rear... her surprisingly toned rear...

"Hey, Ryuji?" He blinked realizing he'd been staring as she turned around. Quickly he acted like he hadn't been gawking and she seemed none the wiser.

"Y-yeah, really well!" He said, dittoing her but also meaning it. "Uh, you're actually, uh..." He figured by now that he wasn't imagining things, Ann was absolutely looking different, plus she already said she hadn't been working out recently, so he was at a loss. Something had to be up. What if something was going on with her he didn't know about? "You're looking kinda... really fit, y'know?" He said, trying to be a careful with his words as possible.

At this Ann gave him a surprised look. "Whoa... Is this your weird way of hitting on me?"

"What?! No!" Ryuji yelled, frustrated that she was taking his concern as a come on. "Just- forget it! We're done for today!"

Ann shook her head and shrugged. "Whatever. Thanks for your help, Ryuji!" She said flippantly as she turned to the locker rooms.

"No problem..." He replied faintly, looking at her again as she turned and walked away. Her body was definitely more taut than usual, and frankly, hotter. If she weren't such a close friend, Ryuji probably would want to hit on her.

"Jeez, I'm goin' nuts..." Ryuji scratched the back of his head with vigor to clear his head of weird thoughts before moving to clean up from their workout.

113312.content:
Futaba Sukura...has never been great at keeping a "sleep schedule". In fact, it was only a few months ago that she had heard the term for the first time! Just like her father, Sojiro Sakura, had explained to her friends many months ago, Futaba tended to to stay up all day and night for 3 to 4 days at a time, taking power naps throughout that stretch of time. For the last 3 or so years, it was a system that has worked for her, even if it was unhealthy.

But some big changes were occurring in Futaba's life, the kind that aren't suited for the "3 days with no sleep" kind of schedule. These changes started about 3 months ago, when Futaba had finally begun her 1st year at Shujin Academy. She was nervous, but also excited. Excited she had friends to support her during her 1st year here...sure, they were just Ryuji, Ann and Yusuke, that Mishima guy was here too, if you counted him. But having lame friends to help her was better than having no friends at all! And boy, was she going to need the help...

Futaba seemed genuinely overwhelmed in this new school...not with any of the school work, she handled that just find. Except for English...she hated English. No, it was the hundreds of different new faces that she had to grow accustomed to. She had to memorize dozens of new faces and names per day in her first week alone, it was horrible!

And yet, somehow worse than the forced social interactions was what she began to face about 2 months into her school year...EXAMS.
Futaba had remembered taking exams and doing just fine with them...but this was back when she was in middle school. High School exams were a completely other world compared to Middle School Exams. These were exams Futaba had to actively study for! And study she did...or, study she would, if it weren't for her sleep schedule...or lack thereof.

And there in laid the problem Futaba was facing...if she wanted to do well on her exams, in an effort to do succeed in school and impress her new classmates, potentially making new friends...she had to completely adjust her day-to-day actions during the Evening. Futaba was spending most of it studying, getting no time to hop on her computer to play her wide assortment of games! Sojiro was even enforcing a bed time! "I'm 16, damn it!", Futaba angrily thought one night, head on her pillow, "I'm too old to have a bed time!..Stupid Sojiro.."

Though, despite her protests, Futaba was adapting well to the sleep schedule thrust upon her..she just wished she'd have time to play her games. It was around a week later that Futaba had overheard something on the way to school. She heard two 2nd Years boys talking about a new Soda Shop in Akihabara...Futaba's mouth started watering upon hearing this...but it got better. The Shop specialized in selling Futaba's favorite brand of Soda, Dr. Salt!

Futaba, against all her logic and better judgement, lunged into the conversation of the two boys, literally wedging her head between the two. Like a rabid animal, she breathed down the neck of one of them, getting uncomfortably close to the boy and snarled "What...time...does...that...Soda Shop...OPEN!?"
The boy, supremely creeped out by the proximity of the younger girl, said "Um...I-I think it opens around 11 AM? It closes pretty late too, so just go to it after school...ok, so could you please get off me now!?" Futaba obliged his request, exiting the train car. She was lucky that those boys don't go to Shujin...didn't need anyone thinking she's even more of a weirdo.

But what Futaba did need was SODA! That day, after school, she didn't go directly home nor did she head to the Underground Walkway to hang out with Ryuji, Ann and stupid Inari...she headed straight from Akibi and made a bee-line to the fabled Soda Shop. Futaba gazed upon the modest sized Soda Emporium like a conquistador discovering El Dorado...it was beautiful.

Futaba rushed in, and was again amazed by the place...every flavor of Dr. Salt ever released, some flavors were even exclusive to this shop! After circling the Isles for about 20 minutes, she was snapped back to reality by the clerk at the front desk. "Hey kid, are you going to buy somethin' or what?"
Futaba, though flustered at this interjection, had indeed decided on what she wanted to buy. After all that time in the isles, she went back to the section with her desired product.

Futaba approached the front desk, barely managing to see over it with her small stature, and placed upon it a case 6 pack case of ice cold...

1133121.content:
While one of the other flavors of Soda, Chamomile Lemon, would help her adapt to a sleep schedule better...Futaba didn't drinks Soda to help her sleep, no one did! She drank for two reasons: It was refreshing, no matter the season and for the SUGAR! So that's why Futaba flung a hefty pack of Dr.Salt: EXTREME Mango Sugar Blast onto the counter...As she wrestled the 2000 yen needed to buy the pack from her jacket pocket, she had to stop herself from salivating in front of the clerk.

Even if Sojiro didn't like her having too much Sugar, it was Futaba's allowance, so she'll spend it on her the beverage of her dreams if she wanted to! With the transaction made, Futaba grabbed the soda case from the counter, slightly struggling with the weight of the bottles. As she was readying to rush out the door, she remembered something! She turned back to the clerk and asked, Hey, um, sorry to bother you again, but, do you guys have any other ways I can order your Sodas? Like a phone number, website, even a Twitter handle I can follow so I know when new flavors are in stock?" The lazy clerk, taken aback by the surge of questions by the young girl. He hastily replied, "Ugh, yeah, I think that stuff is all wrote on a poster on the front door. Should see it on your way out..." While he wasn't lying, he hoped that was enough to get the small redhead of the store already. And so it was, as he watched her slowly exit, he wondering how a small-ass girl like that is gonna guzzle down all that soda...

That just shows that most people had never met someone like Futaba before...despite her former status as a shut-in, never exercising throughout much of any of that period of 2 and half years, she's managed to stay absurdly skinny. Maybe it was her hyperactive nature and her insane sleep schedule effecting her metabolism? Whatever the reason, Futaba didn't care about keeping it that way, as she had already finished the entire 10 pack of Dr. Salt: EXTREME Mango Sugar Blast by the end of the day. Even if she wouldn't be able to sleep tonight, in her mind, this was normal. But in most cases, the Dr, Salt's she drank had much less sugar...now that Futaba had experienced the Sugary goodness of EXTREME Mango Sugar Blast, she had to have more...more...MORE, SO MUCH MORE!

Futaba wasted no time ordering 4 more packs of 10 of this Soda...and as it was a Veritable Nectar of the Gods to her, she needed all she could afford. Thankfully, it was now a Sunday, so as her order arrived in the morning, before Sojiro even woke up, Futaba was giddy as can be and she snatched the huge package off the front porch.

Rushing to her room, Futaba stepped slowly and quietly, both to not wake Sojiro and so she wouldn't drop the box, breaking the blessed bottles within. Making it into her room, she heaved one of the four packs from the box, taking out the other 3 to store in her personal mini-fridge for later use. She downed her 2nd 10 pack in less that 90 minutes, her stomach bubbling with fruity fuzzy goodness. Even as she lay on her bed, belly full of Soda, it still didn't seem like enough. She needed more Dr. Salt in her...like a camel in a desert, she thirsted for more!

Ignoring any calls from her friends to come hang out, Futaba spent the remainder of her Sunday in sugary Soda bliss, downing the other 30 bottles of soda and any other soda can that were lying around the house. In total, Futaba consumed about 21.2 gallons of Soda on this Sunday alone...she writhed in both pleasure and minor nausea as she somehow drifted off to sleep...

As her 6 AM alarm woke her up, Futaba rose from her bed, tired from her soda binge, struggling to keep her balance. She knew drinking all that soda would put some pounds on her, which she had no objections to. After double-brushing her teeth, she pulled out the scale Sojiro kept under the bathroom sink, stepping on it.

Futaba's tired eyes shot wide open when she found that...

"Well, since this is more of a test stream to see how you guys feel about this kind of this, I'm gonna do my first review on a flavor I'm quite familiar with: Dr. Salt: EXTREME Mango Sugar Blast!" Through her nervousness, Futaba feigned excitement, heaving the 2 liter bottle onto her desk.

Staring at the sugary, fizzy soda, with an orange color more intense than her own ginger locks, Futaba felt anticipation and excitement bubble up inside her once more, similar to the carbonation that will soon fill her stomach...Futaba carefully opens the bottle, pouring the Soda into a tall cup. She then turns to address her audience with revived vigor. "Alright, so, before I start drinking, gotta let you guys know, I'm not just gonna be chugging this Soda, nuh-uh....That's what I did yesterday...anyway, this and any possible streams in the future is gonna be half-entertainment...half-informative. It's all about what I taste in the flavor profiles in these...expertly crafted sodas. That's why I'm not using any ice, you gotta drink it warm!" Futaba could hardly believe she was talking so professionally about observing "flavor profiles" and crap, but if this is what some people liked, she'd oblige their interests.

Without further delay, Futaba began her "review", taking light sips of the soda, she remarked on its sweetness, a rather really obvious trait for this brand. She then made vague comments on the tasting hints of other "fruit flavors", stating she detects hints of peach, grape and lemon. These hints of flavors were fabrications, as anyone could tell you by looking at the nutritional facts on the bottle's label...anything that wasn't Mango extract was an artificial flavor. Futaba was just saying anything she could to convince both herself and her audience that this wasn't just her streaming herself drinking soda...

As Futaba was halfway down the bottle, finishing off her 2nd glass, she saw she'd already lost 70 of her 300 viewers. This sight brought Futaba's enthusiasm back down to the negative. As such, Futaba decided to go ahead and stop, proceeding to drink the remaining Dr. Salt right from the bottle...about 25 seconds into her uncivilized soda siphoning, she heard several pings from her trademark headphone. Upon finishing the bottle, she saw 5 or 6 little boxes in her "Notifications" bar of the stream site. They contained messages saying things like "finaly, some real chugging :D" and "bout time u ditched the cup :/", things of that nature...it seemed like her audience actually liked it when she chugged the soda like a slob...this was reinforced by the astounding fact that each message had an amount of money attached! 300 yen, 700 yen, 1200 yen, 2000 YEN! Futaba was dumbstruck...

She addressed her watchers, "Ok...ok, ok, ok...OKAY! So...if I'm getting this right...you guys are willing to gift me...real money just to watch me chug soda? By the bottle?!" The response from the chat was fast and positive:
heck yea

totally

its hot, so yeah

With 8 minutes on the clock and over 20 donations of varying amount, she spoke to her viewers "Ooooof....and that...is that, guys. I'm out of soda to drink! Even if I had more, I don't think I could keep going. My stoooooooomach....mmmh. So, with no more soda, guess I'll end off here. I'm, uh, gonna put a poll on twitter to see if you guys wanna watch me do this again next Monday. See ya then, maybe!" Futaba then flipped off her webcam and ended the stream...she was exhausted, mentally and physically. Sure, 4 bottles of Soda were no match for her yesterday, but that was when she was alone...in front of an audience, she had to have some shame, so restraint...no one wanted to see her puke, so she paced herself the whole stream.

"Hmmm...on second thought", Futaba pondered, "It would be better for me to use this cash to get some bigger clothes...even if I do enjoy when boys stare at by thick body, I'm not ready to get too much attention..." In the crowd of her fellow Shujin Students, all making their way to the Aoyama Itchome Line on their way home. As all the students walked, Futaba broke their collective silence, emitted a nervous chuckle, embarrassed at her previous thoughts. This garnered quite a few glares from the other students, some judgement, some not. Futaba's cheeks became flush with red and in an attempt to spare herself further embarrassment, Futaba walked much faster, breaking away from the pack, plump thighs rubbing together all the way.

Just like the past 2 days, Futaba did not immediately head home from school. She instead made a major detour on her quest for clothes. And if there's any place that she can find clothes, it's Harajuku! Stepping out from the station, Futaba started at the trendy districts streets, decorations on every window, so colorful and vibrant. As she tried to keep a look out for clothing boutiques of her style, Futaba thought back to when her frizzy haired friend brought her here, as part of helping to complete her "promise list"...pushing herself past people on the busy sidewalks, these memories of her time with the boy brought her a much needed calm.

Nearing the end of the main clothing district, Futaba had yet to find a boutique that had both her ideal style and price range. Walking further into the district, Futaba came upon a very large building, even larger than most stores she had seen in Shibuya! It was a "Junes"...Junes? Futaba remember hearing about this line of stores somewhere before..."Oh yeah! I saw an article about this store about this store on a news blog! Something about buying out smaller businesses in Western Japan...real nasty stuff." Despite those rumors, Futaba walks into the Mega Store anyway. As she made her way to Junes' clothing section, her inner monologue continues. "Hmmm...looking around here, it doesn't seem too bad. Maybe that article was just rumor mongering...though if it was true, we'd definitely take the Heart of the Junes Exec...I miss the Metaverse."

Her thoughts continuing at an unabashed pace, Futaba had only just now noticed that she was knee deep in her intended destination, Junes' Clothing Section. Trying to find her way around, she lost her way in the aisles, all filled with clothes ill suited to both her personal taste and age. As she wondered, Futaba conveyed her frustration aloud. "Hunting/Fishing? No...Sports Wear? Hell no...Swim Wear? I'll get back to you later...Childrens? Ah come on, I went in a circle again!? Aggggh, I'll never find the pop culture sectioooooon!!" Falling dramatically to her knees, Futaba cried in frustration, similar to the ending to Planet of The Apes. As she cried, Futaba felt a tap on her shoulder, after which the source of the tap spoke.

"Hey, aren't you Sakura-san? You know, the one who always hangs around Sakamota and Takamaki?" The voice was...nice. Not all that deep, but comforting...but how did this guy know who her friends were? Looking up, Futaba saw that the voice came from..."Mi...Mishima?!" "Yeah, its me, heh. Didn't know you shopped for clothes here too, Sakura-san. I heard you yelling about the 'pop culture' section, cus I was just over there. I can help you find it if you're looking for shirts!" Futaba was verbally stunned...How could that smooth, heavenly voice be coming from Mishima!? The guy that both their leader and the rest of her team basically treated as a 'necessary nuisance' cus he was such a freaking loser! How could the person who saved her from almost breaking down in a public store be Mishima of all people!? As she tried to find the right words, Futaba looked back at her unexpected savior, noticing that he looked...very different. It had only been a few months since she and the rest of the former thieves had last spoken with him, but even from her short line of sight, Mishima looked a lot taller. His muscles looked a bit more defined as well, especially on his jaws and cheeks, now looking like a normal 3rd year boy instead of a tall 14 year old. The hair on his head had only grown out slightly, the back of his hair had grown further down to touch his neckline and his bangs now appearing smooth and trim. Futaba could even see some peach fuzz starting to emerge under Mishima's nose and chin...finally, from the floor, Futaba was able to take in his gorgeous deep grey eyes, darkened like the biggest storm cloud...when did he get such cool looking eyes?

Finally getting off the floor, Futaba still faced the surprisingly cute Mishima, managing to nervously muster up some words..."Oh..y-yeah, I was looking for that s-section...getting shirts and things...taking me there be great. Fitting of that line of thought, she and Mishima arrived in the Pop Culture sub-section of the aisle, the shelves lined with tee-shirts possessing patterns and designs from all sort of videos game, anime and movies. Futaba marveled at the size of the selection. Looking around her, Futaba was thrilled to see that the shirts were available in her new size! "Awwwwhaha-some!", Futaba exclaimed, jumping up and down, unaware that Mishima was still behind her, trying his absolute hardest not to stare at the younger girls bouncy bits. 'Huh? Oh right, Mishima!", Futaba spun around to greet him once again, words rapidly ejecting from her mouth. "I just have to thank you for showing me this place, there are so many super cool shirts in my size and truth be told, this is my first time shopping here, I didn't even know Tokyo had a Junes, so I would have never found it without you, thank you, thank you THANK YOUUUUU!" "I might be...I already have your number, so if I decide that I am, I'll call you." "Already...oh, right...you're big into hacking stuff. I remember your leader tell me that too...well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me. See ya round!" As Mishima walked away from her, Futaba could not help but stare at his long, lithe legs, leading up to a fine boy butt..."Ughhh!", Futaba shakes her head, gaining back her concentration..."God, is that how boys feel when they stare at our butts!? Whatever, I need to buy some clothes already, times a-wastin'!"

Some time later, Futaba finally arrived home. As the door was unlocked, Sojiro still had Lablanc open. That was fine for Futaba...the less time he spent around Sojiro, the less chance he'll get worried about her putting on weight. Settling in her room, Futaba flung her shopping bags on the floor, filled with clothes both her size and several sizes larger. She knew she'd gain more Soda weight, so it didn't hurt to plan ahead. Deciding she'd sort through the clothes tomorrow, Futaba plopped onto her bed, breasts jiggles slightly as she landed. As it calmed down, she stared at them, "Ugh...still not used to all the movement up here..." Browsing her phone, Futaba spotted Mishima's contact info...she thought about his offer earlier. Was he really not a loser anymore? Futaba looked back at the info, thinking:
1133121211.title: New Clothes, Newer Relations

choices: A group of people jumped her from the alley. It was...her friends!?
A strange man in a suit appeared from the alley, with a friendly face!
11331212112.content:
Futaba continued to stare at her phone, Mishima's LINE ID Icon staring back at her. Thoughts roiled through her mind, a blush surfacing on her still thin cheeks. However, Futaba had to dismiss these thoughts, shaking her head in a cartoonish fashion. "No, no, NO!", she thought, "I can't afford to start dating now, especially a 3rd year like him! Besides...I need to prepare for my stream on Friday Night. Need to stop off at the Soda Emporium. Bet there are gonna be a lot more donations. Looks like I won't have to get a job for a while, hehehehehe~"

Futaba let out a quiet, but still audible giggle as she continued her thoughts, getting up from her bed to change out of her clothes. Taking off her shirt and jeans, she was left only in her Training Bra and Underwear. Staring down, she noted that she should have bought some actual Bras at Junes earlier, a mistake she'll have to deal with later. Further down, she eyed her paunch, currently resting just at her pantie-line. "Wonder how big this is gonna be after tomorrow...super weird, but it feels good to...touch it", a lewd thought appeared in her mind as she pet her baggage. After spending several minutes transfixed on her belly, Futaba turned towards her desk, ready to put away her glasses. Reaching for the drawer she kept them in, a large sight appeared out of her eye. A pile of...papers. White Papers, with a few folders scattered about the pile. "Papers...what the..."

It took half a minute before Futaba realized what those papers were. In her fervent Soda Lust, she had neglected to do her Homework for the past 3 and half Days....
"OOOOOH SHIIIIIIIIIIIIIIT!!!", Futaba cried out at the top her lungs. She was lucky that Sojiro was still not home, now frantically searching for a comfortable shirt and pants to wear, letting out panicked yelps and screams all the while. Once again dress, Futaba cleared her chair and turned on her desk lamp, before chugging a fresh bottle of Cielo Mist to wake her up. She then started on her work...

Hours into the night, Futaba worked, solving page after page of complex equations & word problems, along with a Book Report for a novel she'd yet to start.
It was 4:00 AM by the time Futaba's head hit the cushion of her pillow, all homework now completed and sorted by subject in her school binder. But Futaba would only get a brief respite, as her Alarm Clock rang out just an hour later, at 5 AM. Once again, Futaba's newly formed sleep schedule...has bitten her in her bigger ass

Slogging herself out of bed, Futaba searched for her larger Uniform she had ordered...only to be met with her current snug uniform. "Uuugh!", she let out a frustrated groan, remembering the the School won't have her new Uniform ready for her until next Monday, since she ordered without prior notice. Grabbing the Uniform, she chucked it to her bed and headed toward her bathroom. Not in the mood to shower, slowly dipped her head into her bathroom sink and turned on the faucet. Reaching for whatever soap was within grabbing distance, she squeezed a few drops into her long soaked hair and gently lathered it in, before messily rinsing off. Her hair flopped onto her face, dripping on the floor and soaking her shirt. Shaking her head, water was now everywhere around her sink, but Futaba cared little. She roughly toweled off her hair, then brushing out the rest of the moisture, leaving it to air-dry. Removing her soaked shirt, she tossed it in the hamper. For a brief moment, staring at her belly, wanting to rub it like she did last night. This time though, she relented, thinking she didn't have the time for pleasure.

She did, however, have the time for a delicious breakfast. Putting on her Uniform, she decided to forgoing any sort of stocking or legging, leaving her juicy thighs bare. She'd rather she some leg to the boys at school now than run the risk of her legging ripping and embarrassing herself that way. All dressed, hair (sort of) washed and after taking a swig of soda, Futaba was out the door, headed to LaBlanc!

Arriving at the cafe, Futaba peaked inside, checking for Sojiro...he wasn't at the counter. "Phew! Must be in the back., she thought, opening the door fully and quickly grabbing a seat on the closest stool. Minutes later, Sojiro returned to the counter, he exclaimed "Ah! Good Morning, Futaba. I thought I heard someone come in, should've known it was you, sweetie." Sojiro smiled warmly, turning back around, grabbing a bowl from a drawer. "C'mon Dad, I told you no pet names, like sweetie or pumpkin...'s embarrassing" Futaba was only making a point of this to distract Sojiro from noticing her growth. While she was relieved to have taken a seat while Sojiro wasn't up front, successfully hiding her plumped thighs, Futaba couldn't hide her strained upper half or her unwashed face. Both of these would be a giveaway to her seditious soda drinking. Lucky for her, an engaged Sojiro is a blinded Sojiro.

Returning with a small bowl of curry, Sojiro placed it in from of his daughter, chuckling and placing his hands on his hips. "Ehehehe, well if you call me 'Dad' now, why can't I call you cute names?" "Cus names like sweetheart or pumpkin sound like what'd you call one of your dates...makes you sound like a perv if you say it to me...", Futaba took a bit of her curry, thrilled her ruse was working. "Gah...It doesn't sound that bad, does it? I haven't even been on a date in a while..." "Yeah, well don't make a habit out of it, 'k?"

After saying that, the two sat in silence as Futaba finished her curry. A minute of so later, Futaba finished up, now ready to enact her escape plan. Her father still flustered from her harsh words, Futaba let out an exaggerated yawn and stretched her arms out wide, so wide that she conveniently knocked over her empty curry bowl! Shattering on the floor, Sojiro was taking out of his stupor. "Gah! What? Oh, damn it! Where's the broom?", Sojiro heads to the back, giving Futaba her chance to slip away! Her thighs slipping off the stool, Futaba ran to the door! "Ok, gotta go to school, bye Dad, love you!", she yelled, successfully evading her father's gaze.

Making her way to the subway and on time to school, Futaba found that with only 1 hour of sleep and a liquid diet of Soda, it had become rather difficult to concentrate, even for a genius like her. With her lack of sleep and hair washed likely with hand soap, the other students had wondering eyes over every aspect of Futaba today. Overall, it was a horrible day, Futaba's only solace was the brief time she got to play with her belly in the Girl's Restroom during Lunch, as her friends were sadly unable to eat with her.

After School, Futaba no longer cared able the stares of her fellow Students, as she made a beeline to the land of milk and honey, the Soda Emporium! Entering the Store Front, she bought over 30 bottles of Soda, of many different brands & sizes, using the last of her donation money and dipping into her savings a little. She didn't care though, as the thought of drinking all these Soda got her giddy!

That elation would not last long, however...On the way back, Futaba stopped in her tracks...she could have sworn she heard footsteps other than her own. She kept walking, only to hear the footsteps again! "Hello?....If someone's following me, you'd better knock it off! So help me, I'll kick you in the nuts if you have them!" She got no response...at least not vocally.

Picking up her bags, Futaba continued onward. Minutes later, she stopped again, a shadow appearing out of the corner of her eye! Turning towards it...
11331212112.title: The Best Laid Plans....

1142.content:
((This universe takes place when the Phantom Thieves are not known. Including, Haru Okumura’s father lacking such large amounts of distorted desires. As such, the current Haru is living a peaceful, innocent life. That may change on the many paths this story may take.))

“Mhm! Thank you for wonderful meal!” A joyful, polite girl said to the one delivering the food. This elegant, splendor young lady with chin-length curly, light auburn hair wearing her winter school's uniform modified to her taste; a pink turtleneck cardigan with short puffed sleeves with a long-sleeved white shirt underneath, happily ate a Cosmo burger at the restaurant her father owns. She uncross her legs, revealing a black and red plaid skirt, white tights with a black flower pattern and black Mary Jane shoes.

The server girl smiled. “Thank you so much! Would you like anything else, Ms. Okumura?”

Haru neatly padded her face with a napkin and smile at the server girl. “No, that is all. I should be going. May I have the check?”

The server girl chuckled a little seeing Haru’s face and shook her head. “It’s on the house. Company policy that all members of the CEO’s family gets to eat for free.”

“Oh.” Haru seemed a little dejected but quickly recovers. She hand her tray to the server. “Well, that is quite alright then.”

Haru gets up from the table. After saying farewell, Haru left Big Bang Burger. Haru patted her pink turtleneck at her stomach. While she can’t eat it the burgers too oftend, it is a treat she allows herself. She lick her lips, finding mayo and mustard. Haru blush in embarrassment. Did the worker notice it? Haru grab her sleeves and wipe her face to be extra sure.

Haru is happy to have today to herself. Father has been... preoccupied with work. Haru understands but it’s lonely. Her “friends” left her when her father ran into a bit of financial trouble but return when her father clear it up. But Haru didn’t accept them back. Now she is spending her free time alone, taking a more interest in the city.

Haru walked forward and her shoe landed in a puddle. Some water drop on her nose and she looked up. Rain fell on Central Street. Everyone had an umbrella or running to avoid the drops. Haru frown. She thought she checked the weather beforehand for any Torrential rain. Well, they aren’t perfect. But this limits Haru’s options.

Haru stepped out of the puddle and walked slowly through the street. You get wet faster running then walking. However, her poor curly hair is still going to get wet. Haru frown at the thought and hurried her stride.

Haru kept pace till she reached the entrance of the Underground Walkway. She shook her hair a little and checked herself. Her shoulders are only a little wet but her clothes are mostly dry.

“Well then, now that I got myself some food, where shall I go?” Haru perk up, talking to herself.

choices: Haru delivers flowers to a clinic a ways off.

Haru can’t go very far and declines.
11421.content:
Haru walked down the stairs, bringing wet foot prints with her in her black Mary Jane shoes. Haru cheerfully headed for the Underground Mall. Even if she couldn’t hang out in Central Street, she could still spend her time here at the mall. And visit her favorite shop!

Haru walked through the crowded mall, careful not to get violently bumped. Wow, a lot of people are here taking cover from the rain. Haru could hear their grumbling over how this will effect their day. Haru gently makes her way through the crowd, reaching the Flower shop.

“Hello,” Haru waves sweetly at the Flower Shop Employee. Haru’s clothes got a little from making her way through the crowd of people.

The Flower Employee noticed Haru and greeted her back. “Ms. Okumura. It’s nice for you to drop by. What can I do for you?”

Haru shook her head and casually wiped some rain drops off her sweater covering her C cup breasts. “Oh, nothing today. I’m just here today to get out of the rain.”

The Flower Employee nodded her head. “Yes. I’ve seen a lot of agitated people walking in from the rain. Not a lot of them are customers, it’s less then usual. I think the rain is keeping them away.”

Haru frown. “That’s ashame. At least the flowers outside are getting nutrition.”

Haru and the Flower Employee chatted more about Haru’s garden that she has started on the company’s roof top while managing the garden at school. She has been getting a lot of help from other clubs to where she has nothing else to do herself. Her father allow her to make the garden on the roof but doesn’t come to visit for herself, to which Haru gets a little sad.

The crowd thins out a bit while they have their conversation about what Haru is doing and about gardening. An hour passes before the conversation dies down.

The Flower Employee sighs. “Well, I should be focusing back on work. It was nice talking to you, Ms. Okumura.”

“I as well.” Haru politely said before walking away. Perhaps she spend a little time at Babel Music Store. Haru frown a little, feeling that it would probably be more fun hanging out with friends. Good friends.

The Flower Employee turns around, figuring on what to do. She has some flowers that need to be delivered but she isn’t suppose to leave the store. She could use more employees.

A thought occurs to her. “Ms. Okumura, Do you have any plans for today?” She calls out.

Haru stops confused and returns to the Flower shop. “No, not especially.”

“Then could you do me a favor,” the Flower Employee pleaded. “I have a couple flowers that need to be delivered by the end of the day. Could you deliver them on the shop’s behalf?”

Haru is a little unsure but she is well acquainted with the Flower Employee. “But i’m not a shop employee.”

The Flower Employee hesitated a bit but she needed to send these off. “It’s fine. You come around often and help with customers in picking their flowers. I’ll pay you for your trouble. You can even choose which ones to deliver.”

What does Haru do?
11421.title: A Flowers Set up!

11422.content:
*Ring Ring!* *Buzzzzzzzzz.* Haru stopped walking down the stairs, her right foot on the lower step leading to the underground mall. Haru’s hand dove into her pink cardigan pocket. Her fingers wrap around her phone and pulled it out, looking at the caller id. It’s Mr. Okumura, Haru’s father. Wondering what this could be about, Haru answers her phone, brushing away her hair and putting it next to her ear.

“Hello, father.” After a bit of pause, “Why are you calling me?” Haru asked. Several people were coming down the stairs, hurrying to catch a train or go to the mall. Haru stepped out of the way, clutching tightly on the phone.

“Haru! What are you doing right now?” Mr. Okumura’s stern voice made it clear he wanted answers.

“I-I’m in the city, Father. I was making my way to Shibuya’s Underground Mall after it started raining.” Haru leans back on the wall. People walking down the stairs saw the side view of Haru. Her slender body. Her long legs. Lacking in the breasts department, though.

“I need you here so we can have a proper chat on some things that are currently concerning me. Head for home sooner rather than later.” Mr. Okumura said, in a metallic tone.

“Yes father.” The phone turned off and Haru looked at her phone. Now lock, the black screen reflected her sad face. She looks n her eyes, wondering what s troubling her father. Her father sounded very serious over the phone. Is she perhaps in trouble?

Haru put her phone away in her pocket and walked to the stairs to board the train. When she arrived at the platform, the train wasn’t there yet. Haru sighed and waited in line to board. Well, there wasn’t anything she could be doing, Haru thought to herself. If only Haru was able to spend sometime in her family’s garden.

“Train now entering the station.” The announcer said. Haru’s hair danced a bit as the wind picked up. The train got louder and louder till it sped pass Haru. The windows flew passed her, showing her lots of different passengers.

As the door open, Haru absence mindlessly passed through. Not noticing, her shoulder briefly rubbed against a exiting passenger. Haru didn’t see what happen but this person dropped something in Haru’s pocket.

The doors closed and Haru looked back at the station. Haru is taken aback as a girl is frantically trying to get her attention. The strange girl has ash blonde wavy hair styled in bushy pigtails, with parted side bangs on the right side of her face. There are accessorizes with a single yellow hair clip above her left ear, as well as small circular earrings on both ears.

The blonde girl seems like she is trying to tell Haru something, with a frantic look on her face. But Haru can’t hear anything and the trains departs, leaving the strange blonde girl behind. Haru wonders who that was, unaware of the object in her pocket.

—————————————————

Haru arrives at her family’s floor, on a rather large skyscraper, a hour later since she hung up the phone with her father. The Okumura’s are rich, owning a increasingly larger food service business. This business is about to hit international, with a store setting up in Hawaii. As much success as the Okumura’s are getting, they are getting their fair share of rumors. Like drugs in their food that entice returning customers. There is nothing to prove that, nor that ridiculous rumors at Okumura’s food causes... changes to a person’s body.

Haru slips off her Mary Jane shoes and enter home. “Father? I am home.” Haru called out, letting her father know that she arrived. Her sock covered feet press against the floor.

“In here, Haru.” A voice came from a nearby room. Haru followed the voice till she saw her father sitting down and looking at a bunch of papers. Most likely related to the company.

Haru waited a bit before making her presence known. “Hello Father. What is it you want to speak with me about?” She said timidity.

Mr. Okumura looked up. His eyes sternly look at Haru through his glasses. “I heard from a local manger that you were eating at one of our... “branches”. I told you, Big Bang Burger is not a place an Okumura goes to eat.”

Haru looked to the ground, fidgeting with her toes. “Yes Father. H-however, is it wrong to eat there? Our family owns it and the employees work hard...” There is just something in the food that Haru just likes with a guilty pleasure.

“The food this company serves is for the consuming market. It’s not for those who has taken a higher step on the social ladder.” (Ok, so this guy does have a distorted heart.)

Haru doesn’t press further. She watch her big toe cover her other big toe. Going against her father is hard for her. She still relies on him and she genuinely cares for him.

Seeing that he has won the argument, Mr. Okumura relaxes. “Now that you have learned your lesson, let’s get back to what I called you for.”

What does Mr. Okumura want to Haru about?

12132.content:
A Gift from the Village - Now that Chihaya is free from her employment with "The Assembly of Divine Power", her little fortune telling stand is finally making her a substantial profit! Not only that, but her clairvoyant abilities are getting her a lot of attention...but not all of it is good attention. One day, Chihaya discovers a small box on her door step. Inside the box is a crudely made doll of a young girl, with an Ofuda attached to it, the Kanji for "retribution" scrawled onto it. Chihaya is deeply troubled by this and tosses the doll in a nearby dumpster. Later that night, Chihaya has trouble sleeping, an ominous bloated feeling enveloping her...

A Blessing for The Maiden - Every morning, before Chihaya opens her stand for the day, she practices deep meditation in order to hone her abilities. However, this upcoming morning was the start of the Summer Solstice, an important series of days for someone with like Chihaya. To prepare for what will undoubtedly be a busy weekend for the fortune teller, Chihaya practices her deep meditation before she goes to bed, with another session to follow in the morning. During this late night meditation, she goes deeper in her meditative state than she had ever gone before, so deep that it almost felt like she was...touching something. Or someone.
12132.title: Pregnancy

choices: She felt a glow of energy suddenly, pulsing within!
Felt nothing. Chihaya, while unsettled, went to sleep...
121322.content:
Chihaya Mifune sat alone in her apartment, incense lit with naught but a few candles to light her living room, the warm light casting itself on the purple drapes. If an outsider were to observe this kind of display, they'd see it as some form of sorcery or new-age therapy...which was not entirely wrong. You see, as her profession as a fortune teller with legitimate clairvoyant abilities, Chihaya would practice a form of deep meditation each morning before she opened her stand for that day. Her morning sessions looked very similar to the current scene, except it was day time...and there were fewer candles...and no incense.

However, this particular meditative session Chihaya was undergoing was in preparation for a special time of year in her profession: the Summer Solstice! A time when astrological bodies behaved in unusual ways, effecting the lives of many. And with her real-world abilities, it was up to Chihaya to help nudge those troubled by the Solstice in the right direction. And that leads us back to the current scene, as in order to make sure her abilities are in tip top condition to help the many clients she expects this Solstice Weekend, she must meditate twice in less than a span of a day. This way, all her energies will still be focused by the time she wakes up tomorrow.

Breathing in deeply, so very deeply, Chihaya has all her thoughts gathered on her own abilities...digging deeply into her own energies, gathering them, twisting them, letting her energies grow and flourish. Chihaya was so deep into her own mind right now, if her candles were to catch her drapes on fire, she wouldn't smell the smoke!

And yet, even this did not properly describe how deep into the spiritual rabbit-hole Chihaya had gone into...in many moments, she saw an image of a man flickering into her mind...a man dressed in ancient clothes...as the image got clearer, she saw that they were in fact Ainu clothes! Was she contacting someone else...in her mind space? "Mind space, now that's just silly", thought Chihaya...but seriously, she had to know who this man was! Why was he in her mind space?

So...as silly as it seemed...she asked him. Through her thoughts. Chihaya then...thought to the image of the Ainu man, demanding answers "H-hello? Hello, sir? Sorry to bother you, but can you explain what you're doing in my meditative dreams? I have a very important weekend to prepare for and I aint askin' fer no spooky Ainu folks crashin' mah meditation! Oh! oh God..." Seems like, much to her embarrassment, Chihaya slipped into her native dialect while upset in within her own thoughts!

Suddenly, as Chihaya was winding her mind back in embarrassment, the strange man spoke. "Why yes, Maiden. You are correct. I am...a God. And it seems that you and I hail from the same Island as well."

Wait, sorry..what? God? Same Island, WHAT? First of all, even if you were a god, you'd be a myriad Shinto god at best, and everyone knows those are a myth! Secondly...same Island? You seem like an Ainu to me, and I'm not an Ainu! "

"Ah!", proclaimed the 'God', But how wrong you are...there are still many of us myriad gods wondering all of Japan, small as we are. My name is Shinda, one of many gods to the Ainu..and yes, while you may not be Ainu, you are from Hokkaido, as are my people. Among the gods, that makes us kin, and for so long have I sought another from my land who can inhabit the realm of the mind just as I can! And here, I find you, drifting in the expanse! Oh, what joy has come to this eon! Though your gift of visiting this realm is still weak, I will offer you my Blessing. Now, accept my gift to you! "

Chihaya...was very confused. "W-wait, kin? Realm of the Mind? Gift...what in tarnation!? Hold on, back up a bit!"

But 'Shinda didn't answer any of her questions, instead raising his arms in the air, he shouted "NOW MAIDEN, RECEIVE MY BLESSING AND LET YOUR POWERS GROW! FAREWELL! " The strange 'God' Shinda then erupted in a burst of light, snapping Chihaya from her meditative state!

Chihaya breathed heavily, looking around her...while all her candles have been blown out, the incense was still burning. Getting up, she checks her doors and windows...nope, nobody broke in and drugged her. Good to know... Chiyaha started to thinking out loud, "Well. That was something...I think. I probably just tired...better hit the hay, cus I've got a big day!"

After Chihaya doubt checked to make sure her door is locked, she went off to her bedroom. Entering the bedroom, Chihaya thought she felt...something
121322.title: A Blessing for The Maiden

choices: Appears, in which the voice reveals itself as Shinda.
1213222.content:
"Huh, weird. Just felt kind of...tingly, Chihaya pondered aloud. She figured that it must be the stress talking, given how busy she expects to be for the next 21/2 days. Proceeding to ignore her worries, Chihaya readied for bed, stripping herself nude, headband and all. All of Chihaya's worries drift away as her bare body felt the touch of her sheets...

As morning comes, Chihaya wakes from her slumber, ready to face the beginning of her busy weekend. As she commences her morning Meditation, Chihaya is thankful nothing out of the ordinary happens this time...As she walks to her street corner where her Telling Stand in located, Chihaya seeing no one lined up, waiting for her to open as she had though they would...even after she had opened, Chihaya got her typical average of 6 Customers during the day...Though saddened by this, Chihaya understood that it was still a Friday and people were busy during the day, Solstice or no. Still closing early, Chihaya walks back home, hoping the Solstice will be in full swing for Saturday and Sunday.

And was it ever! By the time 10 AM had rolled around, only an hour after Chihaya opens her stand, she had already given 14 people their fortune! This number had only grown by the time the Sun fell, to a staggering 34 fortunes given. Walking home tired, Chihaya immediately collapsed in her bed, still clothed in her dress. However, any amount of meditation or good sleep had not prepared Chihaya for what Sunday was to bring...by the time it was High Noon in the sky, Chihaya had given 22 people their fortunes, with that number doubling to 40 by days end!

By the end of it all. Chihaya...barely made it back to her apartment. Her dress, coated in a fine sweat for 14 hours of Fortunes. To make matters worse, Chihaya begins to think exchanging hands with all those people might have given her a stomach bug, as she couldn't keep her dinner down that night. As she flops onto her bed, sweat and germ ridden clothes removed, Chihaya thinks she might open the stand a little late tomorrow...As she Slumbered, Chihaya didn't hear the laughter of a man, looming over her, as he whispered "Hmmmmha-ha-ha-ha-haaa....So you changed the lives of 80 People during the period, did you Maiden? As fantastic outcome...I only hope you enjoy my gift as much as I do, ha-ha..."

As the Sun that tormented her yesterday peaked through her curtains, Chihaya rolled over to check her alarm. As she did, Chihaya noted an odd bloated feeling on her stomach during the roll...rolling back to her former position, Chihaya felt it again! Getting up from her mattress, Chihaya strolled over to her bathroom, ready to relive herself if she needed to. Lifting the toilet lid up, Chihaya turned back round to do her dirty doo...but as she did, she noticed that her bloating from earlier has taken shape.

And a rather large shape it was! Placing her hands on the protrusion, it looked as if Chihaya had swallowed a regulation soccerfootball! It felt so warm...it reminded Chihaya of...oh god!

"Nonononono NO! That can't be it, I haven't been with someone in years!", Chihaya yelled in a panic...as she paced across her bedroom floor, her worried ranting was only interpreted as Chihaya heard...a laugh. A laugh that seemed like it was coming from nowhere, yet echoing from all directions. Chihaya, in her panicked state, was in no mood for games. "Alright you laughing sombitch, I am not in the mood right now, as either you show your face to me so I can kick your ass or skedaddle the hell outta my apartment!!"

Hearing her enpassioned rage, the source of the laughter...
1213222.title: Shinda's Gift is not active...yet

choices: Chihaya, despite her condition, defiantly keeps her stand open!
Chihaya heeds the God's advice, closing shop till further notice...
12132221.content:
Instead of someone appearing before her, Chihaya only hears more laughter all around her. Chihaya again tries to threaten the voice. "I-I'm serious! Show your face already so I can bust it in" Shortly after, the voice finally responds with word instead of laughter: "Mhahaha-ha! I do not need to 'appear' anywhere, my dear Maiden...if you wish to converse, all you have to do is close your eyes and focus your mind. A simple task, no?"

"Is...he telling me to meditate?!", Chihaya thought, "How do he expect me to meditate at a time like this?! But...if it what I have to do, then I'll do it... Chihaya sat back down on her bed, trying to ignore the discomfort her belly bumps gave her as she crosses her legs. She closes her eyes....and breath in deeply...in...and out, in...and out, in...and out. With only 3 breaths, Chihaya was now deep in the "realm of the mind" she had visited last Thursday, in a much shorter time. Floating in the expanse, she seeing a familiar sight...the Older man clad in Ainu robes! The "God", Shinda!

Chihaya scowled, pointing at the God, "Okay, you old Ainu freak! I don't care if you really are a God or not! Now that I can see you, you're going to explain to me what the heck you did to me to make my belly swell up like a ripe melon!" Shinda laughed, giving a smug retort, "Hahahaha-ha! Do you like it? Twas meerly the effect of my boon I had given you when last we met!" "Boon? What the heck are you talking about?!" "You really did not notice? For the past several days, when the Sun of the Summer Solstice scorched in the sky....you fortunes. Were they not more accurate? More potent? More...Profitable? Due to the unique astrological conditions that occur during a Summer Solstice, I was able to amplify your latent abilities." Chihaya gasped, "You...you made me able to tell better fortunes? Why?" "Because I'm generous, my dear Maiden! And, due to the unique PRICE you are now paying for my blessing, I had nothing to lose..."

"A...a PRICE?", Chihaya asked, looking down at her belly... Shinda grinned, "Yes, my dear Maiden, a price...you see, we Myriad Gods, few our numbers have dwindled this past centuries, have needed to devise other ways to sustain ourselves, rather than relaying solely on the Faith grant by our worshipers...One of these methods is give a Gift to humans who posses a strong mind & will, especially during significant events such as a Solstice..." Chihaya interjected, appalled by the God's reasoning, "But...my powers were strong already, strong enough to be real! I didn't need your gift, ya darn weirdo!" "

Ha-ha-ha-ha! Such a naive girl you are...you didn't let me FINISH!!" Shinda's yell echoed through every inch of the endless expanse, its volume seemly threatening the fabric of Chihaya's mind...Chihaya falls to her knees, still floating, as she slowly rose her neck back up to look at the God. Shinda again grinned at this. "Goood...one must be silent when ones superiors are speaking. Now, where was I? Ah, yes, the Boons. Before your outburst, I was about to explain that, whether or not these Gifted humans wish to receive our Boon is of no consequence to us...they will accept unto them regardless. And once the conditions in which our Boons serve their purpose are over, the Gifted Humans will have to pay their dues...a PRICE for being blessed by us! And as one of the few remaining Fertility Gods among my numbers, my PRICE is rather unique...ha-ha-haaaaa~"

At last, Chihaya's worries had been validated. "Fertility God?! You mean...I am Pregnant! Wow..." "Yes...'wow' indeed. In exchange blessing you with an enhancement to you clairvoyant abilities, you have been given the Gift of life within your womb. Or should I say, Lives!" Chihaya looked up from her belly..."Lives? How...how many children am I going to have?" Shinda did not give an immediate response, closing his eyes. This made Chihaya worry. "Hey! I said, how many kids did you put inside me!?" "Eighty. You are carrying 80 children within you. One child for every Fortune you gave during the Solstice period. "80...80 children?! That's...that's not possible! You shouldn't be messing with me at a time like this, you know!"

"I do not 'mess around', Maiden. You will grow within the standard time frame of 9 mortal months. However I must warn you...in the coming months, your stomach will expand exponentially, to a point that by the Summer's end, in a mere 3 months, your movement may become highly restricted...And though you are so gifted with your clairvoyance, I suggest you shut down your Telling Stand for the duration of the Pregnancy, to ensure that there will be no...complications. This is my advice to you, my parting Wisdom. Now...I believe we have conversed for long enough. I shan't keep you any longer...I will now return you to your own reality, though I will continue to monitor your progress as your grow. Farewell, Maiden. Until you're growth is at its end, Farewell."

With Shinda's good bye, Chihaya had no time to saying anything back to him before she opened her eyes, back in her Apartment Bedroom...Chihaya stands up from her bed, looking at her surroundings. Based on the light coming in from her windows, it was still morning, around 20 minutes past 10. She was talking with Shinda for well over 90 minutes! Looking away from her windows, she realized she was still stark naked...walking to her closet, she looked at her selection of dresses. As she chose one, her eyes wondered back to her belly...Chihaya still could hardly believe it that she was pregnant with 80 children...while it seemed unlikely, it had to be true. How else would she have grown this much in only 3 days? Think more on her size, she recalls Shinda's "parting wisdom"...

Closing her business...Chihaya knew she had to make the right choice:
12132221.title: The Beginnings of a Blessed Growth

choices: 1 Week later, Chihaya's Customers grew concerned about her...growth.
1 Month later and her apartment Stairs were now truly a challenge...
121322211.content:
After staring down at her belly, thinking long & hard for what seemed like an eternity, Chihaya came to a realization. She thought, "Even if that weirdo god has a point about how huge I'll be in a few month, I can't afford to to close down my stand! I'm a small business owner, I don't get Maternity leave!" A good enough reason as any to continue her days as planned and head out to work. Grabbing a stylish magenta dress with an off-white lining, an embarrassing though crosses Chihaya's mind, brushing a hand on her still small belly. "Even still...I kind of think I want to keep one or two of these little guys once this is all over. The thought of being a mother...isn't too unappealing.." She chuckled, slipping the dress on and continuing her usual morning routine with little difficulty.

Heading out her apartment door and down the flight of stairs, Chihaya found her dress admittedly a little tight around her belly, but the extra weight was nothing she couldn't handle...right now anyway. She hailed a taxi and made her way to the street of Shinjuku she was set up on, getting stares along the way, even from the cab driver."Is is really noticeable already? Ooooh...I hope none of my regular customers notice." Arriving at her destination, Chihaya propped up the legs of her telling table and set down her chair. Now all she had to do was wait...wait and wait in the intense Summer Heat.

An hour had passed and finally some customers were coming. Chihaya adjusted herself, her butt sticking to her chair due to sweat. 'Really need to invest in a better chair..." Her attention now on the small line that had formed in front of her, she composed herself and began taking their fortunes. Most of them were new faces, some saying they had heard of the success her place had during the Solstice, others had their neighbors recommend them and one of them just came up out of curiosity. "The curious ones always have the best fortunes, he he!". By the time all her customers were attended too, it was already evening, around 4 PM.

The day had turned out better than it seemed it was going to, since Chihaya made her way home with almost 70,000 Yen in profits! Fortune was truly smiling upon her. "To think that Ainu freak want me to shut down...Not with these returns!", Chihaya happily thought as her Taxi arrived at her apartment building. Tipping the driver a little extra, she made her way up the concrete stairs towards her apartment. While going down stairs was no problem, not even a week in and going up them was already proving difficult for the Maiden. Eventually, she made it up the small flight. Catching her breath, the thought of how difficult those stairs would be in a week or a month gave Chihaya a shiver.

Opening her door, she immediately turned her attention towards her stomach. Not her womb, but her actual stomach...Chihaya was STARVING. Never being great at cooking, she normally made herself a salad for Dinner, being enough to sustain her. But tonight, that wouldn't be enough. Chihaya dialed the number for a nearby ramen restaurant. "Yes, hi. Do you think I can get...10 cups of your diakon beef ramen? Yes, I'm sure. No, I just have some company over, that's all!
Yes, for delivery, to this address! Alright, I'll see you then!" Hanging up, the restaurant told her their delivery person would be their in 20 minutes. Returning to her Room, Chihaya slipped off her dress and threw on something more comfortable, a lilac sleep dress that normally reached her ankles, but with her new belly, now stopped at her knees.

After relaxing on her bed for what seemed like ages, Chihaya heard a knocking at her front door. Jumping from her bed, she opened the door with enthusiasm, finding a skinny delivery boy, couldn't be older than 16, hold a huge clear box. "U-um, hello, eh Miss. Delivery for you, 10 Diakon Beef Ramen Cups". The boy was stammering over his words, likely because of the heat and weight of the delivery and trying not to stare at Chihaya's...comfortable clothing. "That'll be 13,450 Yen, p-please" Trying not to laugh at the poor boy, Chihaya turned back into her home to get the money, "Be right back, Delivery-san, so don't go anywhere!" After several minutes of scouring her mess of a purse, she returned and received her souped, handing the boy and even 14,000 Yen. "Keep the change now, thank you for the food!"

Closing her door, Chihaya took no time opening her box and digging into the first Ramen Cup. So warm and flavorful was it that after only minute, she moved onto next cup, then the next and after 20 minutes, all 10 cups were in Chihaya's stomach, making it surge outward an inch or so more. Her hunger sated, Chihaya made her way to the shower, ready to go to bed early. Hot water rolling over her body, Chihaya caressed her stomach...so full of life and soup, she lost track of time as she continued to rub...

Whether it was Shinda's influence or her own realization, a single thought crossed Chihaya's mind as she exited the show..."I'm starting to like this..."
121322211.title: Still need to make money. For the Childrens!
